The Blade Dlardrageth was an enchanted broadsword wielded by Xhalph Dlardrageth in the late 14 century DR.
The Blade Dlardrageth possessed a powerful +2 enchantment that made its blade more deadly and guided the weapons towards its target. It was also a giant slayer â€“ a weapons particularly destructive to true giants and giant-kin such as trolls, ogres, ogre magi, titans, ettins, and the giants of Zakhara. The same enchantment also could knock a giant down on a successful slash. Lately, the Blade Dlardrageth greatly boosted the wielders physical strength.
In the , the Blade Dlardrageth was still in Xhalph Dlardrageths hands within the dreaded Hellgate Keep, where the sword was used to gleefully dice unwitting adventurers.
